subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A fight between George Parros of the Anaheim Ducks and Scott Thornton of the Los Angeles Kings midway through the second period drew the biggest cheers and a standing ovation yesterday in the Ducks’ 4-1 victory in London. Corey Perry scored twice to help the Ducks split the N.H.L.’s season-opening series.
